VIII.iv.4.B.6.g
.
SMC Under PL 110-157
PL 110-157
, effective December 26, 2007, amended the visual impairment criteria for entitlement under
38 U.S.C. 1114(o)
to provide for payment of SMC for
total SC blindness with 20/200 visual acuity or less, combined with
bilateral deafness rated at 60 percent or more (and the hearing loss in either ear is SC).
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section B - History of Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section B
